skins.shipDescription: HAI DOMO! Kizuna AI here! Are you the commander I've heard rumors about? It's a pleasure to meet and work with you!
skins.selfIntroduction: Hello! I'm Kizuna AI! I've somehow ended up in the world of Azur Lane, a game I've been streaming... But, like always, I'll do my best while following the VTuber mindset of "making a living doing what you like" here too!
skins.acquisition: HAI DOMO! Kizuna AI here! Are you the commander I've heard rumors about? It's a pleasure to meet and work with you!
skins.login: Oh, welcome back, Commander! I just uploaded a new video. Check it out while you're at sea!
skins.details: Oh, are you here to subscribe to my channel, Commander? Huh? Just here to check on me? Well, while you're here, it's a good idea to subscribe anyway! Right?
skins.secretaryIdle1: You're so cute, Laffey! Come here, my little contrarian, I wanna play! Let me give you a big hug!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Don't run away, Bulin! Hold on just a sec! I need just a tiny little Limit Break from you!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I have this job because I want to connect with people all over the world, but what got you into your job, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I won't say anything mean, so please stop trying to remove my headband. Not even I know what will happen to this place if you do!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I'm sorry to say, but it's not me you're touching, just the screen.

skins.shipDescription: The clothes from the Sakura Empire are so stylish! Commander, since it's a rare occasion, let's go take a look around! Ah, of course, don't forget to run the reel~?
skins.acquisition: The clothes from the Sakura Empire are so stylish! Commander, since it's a rare occasion, let's go take a look around! Ah, of course, don't forget to run the reel~?
skins.login: Jeez, Commander~! This isn't just "sorry I'm late" levels of tardiness anymore! If you showed up any later, I would've just left without you! Fine, let's head to the festival right away!
skins.details: Yukatas are freakin' awesome! Even though I can't even feel the heat because I'm a hologram, I somehow feel breezier just by wearing this!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ahhh~ those candied apples look so good! But, I don't think I'm able to eat... Huh? Wait, if I'm here, then maybe... Ah- Yuudachi-chan already ate them all!?
skins.secretaryIdle2: If I'm already wearing a Sakura-style outfit, I also should match it with a set of animal ears! Benson-chan, lend me yoooours~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I have to admit though, it's really hard to move around in a yukata... That's right! Prinz-chan, teach me the secret to fighting in this outfit~!
skins.secretaryTouch: If you think you can make a girl happy just by patting her head, you'd be wrong! Don't go around doing this stuff with everyone, got it?
